_meanings:
{@--2@} (Intransitively used)
({%a%}) To follow, come after; {#saMgrAhya#} 
{#ityanuvartate#} <ls>H. 3.</ls> ({%b%}) To continue, endure.
({%c%}) To act towards, behave. ({%d%})
(In <ab>gram.</ab>) To be repeated or 
supplied from a preceding rule, Sūtra
or assertion (said of a word or rule
which continues to exercise 
influence on what follows); {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} in
<ls>P. IV. 3. 95</ls> {#BaktiH so'sya#} (occurring
in Sūtra 89 before) {#ityanuvartate#} <ls>Sk.</ls>

{@--5@} To repeat or 
supply from a preceding Sūtra; {#kecittu#}
{#vijAyate iti nAnuvartayaMti#} <ls>P. V. 2. 13</ls>
<ls>Sk.</ls>

{@--7@} To lead
one to, attach to.

{@--8@} To speak in
favour of, speak for; to approve.
